title: Kolkata Court Grants Bail To Ex-RG Kar Principal, Police Officer Abhijit Mondal Due To CBI's Failure To File Chargesheet In Timely Manner
selftext: 90 days were not sufficient for the country’s premier agency CBI to file the chargesheet. Just like other crimes, this was too forgotten.
comments: Kolkata medicos were idiots, they had a good opportunity to bring mamta down but wasted it, also their own medical associations and big wigs didnt support them
